profile:
At Erie Garage Doors we take tremendous pride in offering our clients a collaborative sales approach to ensure an unmatched customer experience. With over 100 years of combined experience in both residential and large commercial applications you can be assured that you will presented with unmatched product offerings, consultative  solution,  and an installation and service experience that exceeds your expectation.  

Erie Garage Doors only partner with manufacturers who are industry leading suppliers that share our core value of honesty, integrity and exceeding expectations . We are the authorized distributor of Richard Wilcox garage doors, who are one of the most recognized names in terms of quality, workmanship and no hassle warranty coverage!  Our service fleet is equipped with fully stocked service vehicles to reduce your repair time and get your door up and running again as quick as possible. We also offer many payment option on site including Visa, Mastercard and Debit. 

We look forward to assisting you on your upcoming project, garage renovation or brining your door back into working condition.  We do not charge for our consultative service, quotations or assessments!
